title: Still Explosive - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Celebrities   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Showbiz   Wealthy Characters
author: 禾了
description:
Xu Yiren, who has 300,000 fans, scolded Song Tianmei, a new traffic flower with more than 5 million fans, on Weibo: “Who in China doesn’t know that Gu Yu is your backstage!” People are sitting at home, and the pot is coming from the sky. 

Gu Yu: “Excuse me?” 

Three months later, Gu Yu put his hand on Xu Yiren’s side and said softly, “I have never been the backstage of anyone in my life, but from today onwards, I will be your backstage.” >
